price: 33. Ils ne t’apporteront aucun exemple sans que Nous ne t’apportions la vérité de manière plus claire.
arabic: وَلَا يَأۡتُونَكَ بِمَثَلٍ إِلَّا جِئۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَأَحۡسَنَ تَفۡسِيرًا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: walā yatūnaka bimathalin illā ji'nāka bil-ḥaqi wa-aḥsana tafsīran
